Little Kids.description: Content for the youngest viewers only. Restricted to TV-Y rated programming designed for children ages 2-5.

Older Kids.description: Content suitable for older children. Includes general audience and children's programming. May include mild fantasy violence.

Family.description: Family-friendly content. May include mild language, mild violence, or brief suggestive content. Suitable for ages 9-12 with parental guidance.

Teen.description: Content suitable for teens. May include moderate violence, some sexual content, strong language, and mature thematic elements.

Adult.description: No content restrictions. All content visible including mature, adult, and unrated content. This is the default tier for new accounts.

content_descriptors.notes: Peacock displays content descriptors on title detail pages but does not allow filtering by individual descriptors. Filtering is exclusively maturity tier-based. No profanity filter available.

MPAA.notes: Full MPAA coverage for films. Includes NR (Not Rated) category for unrated content, mapped to Adult tier.

TV_Parental_Guidelines.notes: Full TV rating coverage for series and specials.

ESRB.notes: Peacock does not host games. ESRB ratings are not applicable.

Common_Sense_Media.notes: Peacock does not display Common Sense Media ratings or integrate with CSM data.
